subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Juan Pablo Montoya, who left Formula One for Nascar two years ago, will need a new sponsor for 2009 after Chevron said it would end its backing of his car in the Sprint Cup series. Chevron will leave Nascar’s top division in favor of local and regional programs to promote its Texaco Havoline brand motor oil, the company said in a statement.
